xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/664847-40: The Temptation of Christ 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c9YHnF1lRPZC8pR4AyFLrtqg4JD.jpg Jesus Christ, the Son of God, sets out to prepare Himself for His earthly mission to save humanity by dying on the cross to atone for the sins of the world. Christ is led into the Judean desert to strengthen His spirit with fasting, prayer and time with His heavenly Father. 40: The Temptation of Christ
